name: Lost Boy Cave
description:
Introduction

Need a significant minus tide to get anywhere near this sea cave. USGS map is mislabeled; cave is in the next headland to the north.

There is a man-made tunnel punching through Maxwell Point just to the south.

Approach

Descent

Exit

Red tape

If you want to get into serious cave exploration, join some experienced local caving group (sometimes called 'grotto's).

Beta sites

  • OregonCaves4U.com : Lost Boy Cave

Trip reports and media
